3.3.1 No wildcard imports:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='id' value='PackageDeclaration'/>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
        <property name='allowDefaultPackage' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='PackageAnnotation'>
        <property name='id' value='PackageAnnotation'/>
        <property name='annotation' value='javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault'/>
    </module>
    <module name='PackageAnnotation'>
        <property name='id' value='PackageAnnotation'/>
        <property name='annotation' value='javax.annotation.ParametersAreNullableByDefault'/>
    </module>"
}

{

        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically' value='true'/>
        <property name='separateLineBetweenGroups' value='true'/>

}

}

4.5 Line-wrapping:
{

}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}

4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_CATCH'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceBefore'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_CATCH'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, PLUS, MINUS, DIV, MOD, SL, SR, BSR, STAR, BAND, BOR, BXOR, QUESTION, COLON, LNOT, BNOT, LT, GT, LE, GE, EQUAL, NOTEQUAL, INSTANCEOF, PLUS_ASSIGN, MINUS_ASSIGN, DIV_ASSIGN, MOD_ASSIGN, AND_ASSIGN, OR_ASSIGN, XOR_ASSIGN, STAR_ASSIGN, SR_ASSIGN, BSR_ASSIGN, SL_ASSIGN, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR_ASSIGN, BXOR_ASSIGN, LAND, LOR, PLUSPLUS, MINUSMINUS, DOT, METHOD_REF, ELLIPSIS, AT, LPAREN, RPAREN, LBRACE, RBRACE, LBRACKET, RBRACKET'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='TYPE_EXTENSION, LOR, LAMBDA, COLON, RPAREN, COMMA, SEMI, TYPECAST, ARRAY_INIT'/>
    </module>"
}
